channel.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_BaldwinC Mod BaldwinC
item.description:
@Mod_BaldwinC wrote:

go into client.java and ctrl+f and search for albel nox and then add your name and the character rights as follows:
3= owner
2= admin/staff
1= mod
0= nothing

Read full topic

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @Ninja Ninja
item.description:
@Ninja wrote:

Change it to 3, not 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte
item.description:
@KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte wrote:

… Did you see, I said. I want others to be admin on my server aswell! … I want to be admin too. But I dont want to carry the name ‘admin’ around through my server. Im leaving that account forgotten, or i might give ‘admin’ to a different person. All i need is help on making more then one admin work, cause the guy keeps getting disconnected, and it edits his char rights back to 0! then it will laod game and im not admin

Read full topic

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Ok then change admin to the other person you want to be a admin…Common sense man

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte
item.description:
@KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte wrote:

Yea but… I just want to be able to make more then one admin account, I have one thats called ‘admin’ and he became admin by default. I want to make other people on my server admin…

Read full topic

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

I think it just does that cause it does it for me and im still a admin for my server.And when it says your already loged in it happens to every one sometimes u dont have to worry about that.

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte
item.description:
@KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte wrote:

Uhm, TKB. Exactly what slot :o? Cause’ like, I just noticed. Everytime I log in on an account that I have set rights to 2, or 3. It will say connection lost upon logging me in. Then I will click ‘login’ and it will say account is already logged in, So i click login again. It logs me in, I reopen my char’s txt and notice the char- rights are down to 0.

EDIT:: Ok lawl,… Uhm, I deleted the antilag.java and it still didnt work, so i recovered antilag.java

Read full topic

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @TKB_Wizard TKB_Wizard
item.description:
@TKB_Wizard wrote:

On testscape we can’t modify stats, I don’t know why.

I tried that lot of times, we “can’t” modify stats or w/e in characters folder.
If you want to be admin, try on an other slot, and change character right to “3” for owner.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @majorclucker majorclucker
item.description:
@majorclucker wrote:

Completely log out and close all clients… then edit to level 3… save

I’m not sure if this will work or not, but give it a go.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin trouble- reward for help!
item.dc:creator: @KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte
item.description:
@KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte wrote:

Alright, well. Me and a bud of mine, Chad Haynes are starting a server; Based on TESTSCAPE SOURCE.
Last night me and him were in varrock talking about how we can get it to work. I looked at zass0’s tutorial and followed it as he had instructed. But… Also im thinking that I ‘might’ be doing things right. Just my compiler won’t function properly. :o Here I will show you my compiler ;error;

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: antilag/java Press any key to continue . . .
Now, im not sure if this is the main source of my problem, but. I’ll go ahead and include the part of my client.java

[code] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“phantom”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“chad haynes”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“albel nox”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“roooony”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“base”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pwnzor69”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“smitty”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“stoned4life1”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lemonslayer”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“inuyasha”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“bdawgx”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“k k kwarlord”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“juggalo269”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
[/code]
The ‘phantom’ which is the first on the list is me, chad haynes is my friend, an admin. But it won’t let us spawn anything.

Next’ Is a copy of my saved game file. I will take out the password.

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = phantom
character-password = *******

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3230
character-posy = 3438
character-rights = 0

character-messages = 0

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0

[LOOK]

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 31 15200
character-skill = 1 1 25

character-skill = 4 1 0

[/code]
Well I just noticed… That my player rights are ‘0’ … That is like the fourth time it went back to ‘0’ from when I made it; ‘3’ … I then clicked save. And ‘compile’ I get that error, But my runserver works fine!

Please, if you know of any thing that could help our problem, you will be rewarded with a REP+, and if you’d like. A player-mod position. Thanks!

Read full topic
